description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Paris, France. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Boutique Paris Luxury near Champs-Elysees with Daily Breakfast & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Experience Parisian elegance in the city's heart at this boutique hotel just steps from the glitz and glamour of the Champs-Elysees. As part of the prestigious Relais & Chateaux collection of luxury hotels, this sophisticated five-star escape offers classic French dining, first-class service and exquisite heritage features as the hallmarks of your stay. Hôtel Balzac Paris feels like your own slice of Parisian heaven. Spend your days wandering along the Seine, strolling past the city's fashionable boutiques, art galleries and world-renowned dining spots. Return to savour gourmet French cuisine at the Michelin-starred restaurant Pierre Gagnaire, and finish your night with a cocktail at the intimate lobby bar.

hotels.title: Intimate Boutique Paris Haven with Daily Breakfast, Spa & Private Garden
hotels.description: Located in the heart of Paris, Les Jardins du Marais redefines boutique luxury with a discreet facade that hides a world of refined elegance. Take a break in Le Bar and discover a selection of cocktails and fine wines in a charming ambience, or head to the Spa du Marais, a radiant exposed stone and marble sanctuary that promises a blissful escape. Step outside into one of Paris' most remarkable private terraces, a surprising green oasis that plays masterfully with space and light. Inside, the hotel's intimate cinema offers a unique personal movie experience. Just moments away, the Place des Vosges invites you to admire 17th-century architecture, while the world-renowned Centre Pompidou stands ready to dazzle art enthusiasts.

hotels.title: Five-Star Parisian Escape with All-Day Bar & Lounge
hotels.description: Be part of the enchanting cityscape when you stay at the five-star Maison Albar Hotels Le Diamond, boasting the city's most elegant and trendy address. The classic Haussman facade of the hotel's exterior gives way to a contemporary interior design: marble surfaces, plush velvet furnishings and cosy fireplaces add a splash of luxury. Venture over to the all-day Diamond Bar for signature cocktails, aperitifs and gourmet snacks in a sultry, romantic setting.

hotels.title: Quintessential Paris Sofitel Luxury Near Champs-Elysées with Exquisite Onsite Dining
hotels.description: Nestled near the elegant Champs-Élysées, this 5-star Sofitel hotel invites indulgence in Parisian luxury. With the striking elegance of a Haussmannian façade and interiors curated by renowned designers, this haven blends warmth and sophistication. Revel in breathtaking Paris views, explore world-class museums, and indulge in high fashion throughout the famous 8th arrondissement. Unwind in rooms and suites designed for relaxation. Savour famous chef Christian Constant's bistro-style creations at Les Cocottes Arc de Triomphe Restaurant, where exquisite cuisine meets a relaxed, sunlit ambience. This is an invitation to experience Paris at its finest.

hotels.title: Dazzling Parisian Elegance near River Seine and Notre-Dame Cathedral with Rooftop Dining & Spa
hotels.description: Tucked in the heart of Paris’s 4th arrondissement, this stylish escape blends contemporary luxury with the city’s artistic and cultural pulse. SO/ Paris sees fine art and fashion collide across 162 luxuriously stylish rooms, all with views over the internal courtyard or the city's rooftops and landmarks. Indulge in exceptional dining at Bonnie on the 15th floor, or head to the 16th floor bar and club, offering a sophisticated space to unwind with expertly crafted cocktails and panoramic views. For ultimate relaxation, the Maison CODAGE Spa provides the perfect balance of indulgence and rejuvenation. Step outside and immerse yourself in the vibrant Parisian atmosphere. Stroll to nearby landmarks like Île Saint-Louis and Notre-Dame Cathedral, or wander through the historic Marais district, home to trendy boutiques, galleries and cafes.

hotels.title: Paris Five-Star Historic Elegance within the 9th Arrondissement
hotels.description: Live like Parisian nobility in the fabulously-located InterContinental Paris le Grand, an IHG Hotel, overlooking the world-famous Palais Garnier opera house. Opened in 1862 and inaugurated under Napoleon III, this five-star hotel is at the heart of Parisian society. Elegantly appointed, this Second Empire property defines grandeur with its dining options, including the iconic Café de la Paix, boutique-style suites and stunning views of the instantly recognisable, monument-lined boulevards.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Paris Escape Overlooking the Place de la République
hotels.description: Discover a charming blend of historic elegance and modern sophistication at Crowne Plaza Paris-Republique, an IHG Hotel. Located in the 11th arrondissement, use this stylish hotel as your launchpad to explore the city of love. The quintessential Louvre Museum and stunning Notre Dame Cathedral are only a short drive away, while other attractions are easily accessible by metro. Enjoy classic French cuisine in the chic Restaurant Le Dix or toast to your stay on the sun-soaked terrace.

hotels.title: Romantic Paris Retreat near the Palais Garnier
hotels.description: Escape for a romantic retreat to the City of Love and fall for the Kimpton St Honoré Paris, an IHG Hotel. Experience authentic and awe-inspiring Paris as you take to the streets to visit the famous Arc de Triomphe and the Eiffel Tower. Luxuriate at the Spa CODAGE Paris or take a dip in the heated indoor pool. Unwind after a long day of exploration by savouring a sophisticated cocktail as you enjoy unrivalled 360-degree views of Paris from the Sequoia rooftop bar and garden.

hotels.title: Five-Star Paris Escape Near Arc de Triomphe & Champs-Élysées
hotels.description: Discover the magic of Paris and immerse yourself in the city’s unrivalled culture, couture and cuisine from a stylish base, the boutique five-star Hotel Napoleon, just steps from the Champs-Élysées and the Arc de Triomphe. Aptly named after one of France’s historic figures, the hotel effortlessly combines French elegance and vibrancy through its exquisite décor and exceptional amenities. The classically designed hotel features a collection of rooms and suites that embody signature Parisian flair, a sleek gym, and a modern onsite eatery and bar - perfect for a quick break in the lively heart of Paris. With such a unique location, there’s no need to venture much further from your doorstep to explore acclaimed landmarks. Wander down the street to visit Parc Monceau, or venture a little further to reach the Louvre Museum or Eiffel Tower.

hotels.vendor_name: Le Bristol Paris - an Oetker Collection Hotel
hotels.title: Timeless Parisian Elegance near Arc de Triomphe with Indoor Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Step into a world of Parisian chic at Le Bristol Paris, this grand dame of luxury hotels boasts 18th-century inspired interiors and impeccable service that will make you feel like royalty. Indulge in the hotel's four Michelin-starred dining venues, pamper yourself at the luxe spa, sip cocktails in the enchanting garden, or let the kids (and your inner child) hang out with Socrate, the resident cat. Sitting pretty on one of Paris' most exclusive streets, this hotel puts the city at your fingertips. Shop 'til you drop at designer boutiques, stroll along the Champs-Élysées, or get your culture fix at the Louvre. After a day of exploring, unwind in the pool with Eiffel Tower views-talk about living the high life.

hotels.title: Refined Parisian Art Deco Hotel near Arc de Triomphe with Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Inspired by the 1925 designs of Jacques-Emile Ruhlmann, this sophisticated hotel stands as a masterpiece of architectural splendour. Home to opulent rooms and suites, this lavish hideaway brings Art Deco elegance back to life, boasting the Le Collectionneur Restaurant and Bar, a speakeasy-style bar and a decadent restaurant. Your position in the 8th arrondissement allows for seamless access to the Arc de Triomphe, Parc Monceau and the elegant boutiques of Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honore, along with front-row seats to the Eiffel Tower's twinkling lights.

hotels.title: Paris Romance with Exceptional Two-Michelin Starred Restaurant
hotels.description: Discover the city of love in style at the Mandarin Oriental, Paris, a property that exudes the elegance and style that characterise France's capital. This palace hotel is perfectly located among perfumed camellia trees in the heart of the city, with the Louvre Museum an easy amble away and the iconic Eiffel Tower waiting after just a short trip on the metro. An array of dining options includes the signature Sur Mesure Par Thierry Marx, awarded two Michelin Stars. Dining here is a must-do, sensory experience sure to make your Paris escape extra-special (reservations are recommended).

hotels.title: Classic Parisian Boutique Escape near Jardin des Tuileries with Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Nestled in the 8th arrondissement, Maison Delano Paris is a perfect mix of Parisian elegance and pared-back luxury. This boutique hotel offers 56 extraordinary rooms with curated furnishings and soft, minimalist designs. The intimate courtyard garden provides a peaceful retreat from Paris' urban pulse. Step outside and Paris is at your fingertips. Stroll to iconic landmarks like the Arc de Triomphe and Champs-Élysées, or explore the boutique-lined streets of Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré nearby. The neighbourhood is filled with Michelin-starred venues and exclusive galleries, while convenient metro access connects you to every Parisian treasure with ease.

hotels.title: Central Paris Elegant Escape near Gare Montparnasse
hotels.description: In the heart of Paris, voco Paris Montparnasse, an IHG Hotel, is the perfect retreat from which to explore the City of Love. Start your morning with a fine coffee and breakfast at 12 Grammes cafe or enjoy some quiet time in the courtyard garden. Indulge at nearby creperies, check out a captivating theatre show or splurge in the boutiques along Rue de Rennes. As the sun sets, enjoy romantic views of Paris from your comfortable room before a good night's sleep.

hotels.title: Contemporary Parisian Escape near Notre Dame Cathedral with Restaurant, Day Spa & Private Gardens
hotels.description: Nestled in the heart of Paris, this Art Deco-inspired escape redefines luxury with a discreet facade that hides a world of refined elegance. Take a break in Le Bar and discover a selection of cocktails and fine wines in a charming ambience, or relax at the tranquil Spa du Marais, a sanctuary of exposed stone and marble. Step outside to one of Paris’ most exceptional private terraces, a surprising green oasis that plays masterfully with space and light. Inside, the hotel’s intimate cinema offers an exclusive movie experience. Just moments away, the historic Place des Vosges invites you to admire 17th-century architecture, while the world-renowned Centre Pompidou stands ready to dazzle art enthusiasts.

hotels.title: Quintessential Paris Sofitel Luxury Near Champs-Élysées with Onsite Spa & Dining
hotels.description: Experience the epitome of Parisian elegance with a stay in the heart of the city's fashion district. The hotel is a stone's throw from the prestigious Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, home to renowned boutiques and the Elysée Palace. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's courtyard or indulge in a culinary journey at Blossom Restaurant, where French gastronomy is celebrated. The hotel's location is ideal for art enthusiasts, with the Louvre Museum and the Grand Palais just a short stroll away. For those seeking relaxation, the hotel's wellness centre offers a tranquil escape, complete with a fitness centre and an array of rejuvenating treatments. In the evening, sip on expertly crafted cocktails at the stylish Le Bar du Faubourg, a favourite amongst the city's fashionable elite.

hotels.title: Paris Five-Star Glamour with World-Renowned Yakuza Paris by Olivier Restaurant
hotels.description: The City of Light is a dream destination - and the five-star Maison Albar Hotel Le Vendome Paris is your chance to live your French fantasies. Spacious rooms decked in gilding and marble look out over the romantic neighbourhood, while innovative dining awaits at Japanese-meets-Mediterranean Yakuza Paris by Olivier, the first French restaurant installation of acclaimed chef Olivier Da Costa. When it's time to be pampered, enter the soothing Spa Vendome for a massage.

hotels.title: Contemporary Paris Montmartre Apartment Stay near Sacré Coeur & Pigalle
hotels.description: Embrace 20th-century Parisian charm and romance with a convenient studio apartment stay, near the iconic Sacré Coeur and Moulin Rouge. Begin your morning with a serene moment in the quaint interior garden before seeking out adventure in the City of Lights. Stroll along Montmartre’s cobbled streets admiring the local boutiques, cafes and art before returning to your artfully decorated room to recharge in complete comfort.

hotels.title: Paris Sophisticated Escape near Opulent Palais Garnier
hotels.description: Combining historic charm and sophistication, the stylish Hotel Indigo Paris - Opera, an IHG Hotel, is the ideal launchpad from which to explore the bustling heart of France. Ideally positioned in the centre of Paris, this hotel is surrounded by iconic attractions, including the dazzling Palais Garnier and the quintessential Lourve Museum only a short walk away. Enjoy classic French cuisine in the chic La Table du VII restaurant before heading out for an elegant ballet or theatre show in the evening.

hotels.title: Boutique Paris Designer Luxury with City-View Rooftop Cocktail Bar
hotels.description: Experience timeless French elegance in the heart of Paris at Hôtel des Grands Boulevards. Designed by Dorothée Meilichzon, all 50 rooms are as unique as they are beautiful, overlooking either the gorgeous interior courtyard or truly Parisian boulevard. Franco-Italian cuisine by renowned chef Giovanni Passerini is served in the glass-topped restaurant, while The Shell bar is on hand for cosy drinks by the roaring fireplace. If you feel like a drink with a view, head up to the rooftop, where The Shed bar serves up creative craft cocktails and romantic panoramas of Paris’ 2nd arrondissement. Founded by the innovative Experimental Group, Hôtel des Grands Boulevards exudes glamour, offering an exciting culinary scene and contemporary hospitality. You can expect a sultry cocktail bar fit for Marie Antoinette, gorgeous canopy beds and marble bathrooms reminiscent of an 18th-century Parisian palace, while smart amenities like mirrored televisions, in-room espresso machines and bedside USB plugs will keep you firmly in the 21st century.

hotels.title: Boutique Paris Montmarte Stay near Sacré-Cœur with Onsite Fine-Dining Restaurant
hotels.description: Fall in love with Grand Pigalle Hotel, a charming Art Deco abode tucked away in Paris' sought-after South Pigalle neighbourhood (or SoPi), a cosmopolitan and festive quarter in the 9th arrondissement, conquered by trendsetting Parisians. Housed in a classically Haussmannian building at the corner of street Victor-Massé and Henry Monnier, this luxurious hotel embodies the revival of this historic neighbourhood. Each of the 37 exquisitely appointed boutique rooms conveys its unique personality through a design of geometric prints, deep emerald walls and opulent brass finishes. Bordered by the popular Montmarte and Opéra districts, South Pigalle is the finest place to embrace authentic art de vivre. By day, stroll the leafy streets lined with concept fashion houses and quaint cafés; by night, neon-lit laneways become animated with eclectic cocktail bars, progressive bistros and, of course, the iconic Moulin Rouge - located less than a 10-minute walk away. When you're not fine-dining at the hotel's indulgent Frenchie Pigalle restaurant (spearheaded by Michelin-starred chef Gregory Marchand), head out to explore some of the city's most iconic sights, from the Eiffel Tower to the Louvre and stunning Sacré-Cœur - which is only 15 minutes' walk away.

hotels.title: Palatial Paris Raffles Opulence with Michelin-Starred Restaurant, Luxe Spa & Movie Theatre
hotels.description: Step into a world where art and Parisian opulence meet at this iconic Philippe Starck-designed palatial hotel, situated moments from the Arc de Triomphe and the Champs-Elysees. Part of the esteemed Raffles group, this five-star haven blends bold architecture with an artistic soul, boasting elegant accommodations filled with contemporary artworks and unique touches like in-room acoustic guitars and mirror-concealed televisions. Experience world-class dining at the Michelin-starred Il Carpaccio or Nobu's Matsuhisa Paris, where Japanese-Peruvian flavours dazzle the senses. Unwind with avant-garde treatments at the Raffles Spa & Wellness, featuring treatments from Dr. Barbara Sturm and 111 Skin, a hammam and a serene indoor pool. After a day of soaking up the charms of the City of Lights, sip on a well-crafted cocktail from the Long Bar, tour the onsite art gallery or indulge in a private screening at the hotel's movie theatre.

hotels.title: Iconic Sofitel Grandeur near Eiffel Tower with Art Deco-Style Restaurant
hotels.description: Everything you want from a glamorous Parisian rendezvous can be found at this iconic address, ideally located in the leafy 16th arrondissement between the Eiffel Tower and the Champs-Elysées, with the best of the city at your fingertips. Marrying the sophistication of an English clubhouse with French art de vivre, the hotel's restaurant and bar, Lordy's Paris Club, promises five-star cuisine and classic cocktails set against grand Art Deco interiors.

hotels.title: Parisian Glamour near the Champs Elysees with Onsite Bar & Restaurant
hotels.description: Set in a 19th-century Haussmannian building, Hotel Keppler offers French elegance just moments from the Champs Elysees. The glamorous hotel boasts designer interiors throughout, including in the chic dining room and the cosy Library Bar, complete with a roaring fireplace. When you aren't indulging in a massage or lounging in the sauna, explore Paris' world-renowned landmarks, all within walking distance.

hotels.title: Stylish Boutique Paris Escape near the Eiffel Tower & Trocadéro
hotels.description: Tucked away on a quiet street moments from the iconic Trocadéro, this retreat offers an exceptional blend of sophistication and convenience. Whether you're here for a weekend getaway or a business trip, this boutique, elegant haven is the perfect launchpad to the best of Paris. Be close to an array of bars, restaurants, museums, sculptures, gardens and fountains. Unwind at the marble-clad Bar Lounge with an aperitif, or step outside for a short stroll to Paris' most renowned landmarks. From sweeping views of the Eiffel Tower to the charming streets of the 16th arrondissement, Hotel Plaza Tour Eiffel places you at the heart of the city's vibrant energy.

hotels.title: Five-Star Champs-Élysées Boutique Stay in Paris' Picturesque 8th Arrondissement
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the romance of the city of light with an elegant stay at the superb InterContinental Paris, Champs-Élysées Etoile. Housed in a boutique Parisian building the hotel sits in the heart of the world-famous 8th arrondissement, where fashion, history and gourmet cuisine collide. This stylish neighbourhood is defined by the world-famous Champs-Élysées Avenue and lies within easy reach of iconic attractions such as the Eiffel Tower and Arc de Triomphe.
